channel.title: Residual Memory - Kimbo's Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Residual Memory - Kimbo's Personal Blog

item.title: Capturing Residual Memory
item.description: The first post of Kimbo Chen’s personal blog. I hope that years from now, I wouldn’t cringe when reading this post. Yes, I couldn’t come up with a more poetic expression and could only think of ResNets. Motivation Back in 2019 when travelling is not impossible, during my tour in the Canadian Rockies, it occured to me that this might be my first time and last time to see these spectacular scenery.
